name: Drone Alliance Europe
goal:
Drone Alliance Europe is formed by leading technology companies in the field and is working to accelerate the integration of drones into our everyday lives so that all European citizens and businesses can benefit from the economic, consumer, and humanitarian potential of this technology.
It represents the drone service industry towards EU Institutions, international organizations and national public bodies.
interests: Budget, Business and Industry, Digital economy and society, Research and innovation, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives:
Implementation of EASA Basic Regulation
Delegated Act & Implementing Rule
U-Space Initiative
